SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.storage

Class LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.storage.LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection
Enclosing class:
LmtpConnectionPool
public static class LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection extends Object
Wrapper for a pooled LMTP connection with lifecycle tracking.

Tracks connection age, idle time, and validity for pool management.
